cleaned_text: OF OUR NEXT DETOX TBA*** Join me for 21 days to detox ALL aspects of your beautiful self! We're talking a good ol' fashioned physical, mental, emotional, energetic, and environmental scrubbing! This "whole-being" detox cleans out the sludge from all areas of life... what needs to go will go... what wants to stay will have more room to play! We'll meet via ZOOM for physical and energetic clean-up/clear-out, nutritional guidance, and group mentorship, and stay connected throughout the program in our Private Facebook Forum. If you have any questions about the center, please get in touch with us! Someone from our team will reply as soon as possible.
